summary: Refactored skill-lean-research and skill-lean-implementation from subagent delegation to direct execution pattern. Archived original agents, added deprecation notices, inlined MCP tool execution into skills, updated CLAUDE.md and pattern documentation.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting architectural change from delegation to direct execution

completion_data.completion_summary: Refactored skill-lean-research and skill-lean-implementation from subagent delegation to direct execution pattern, fixing MCP tool hanging issues in subagents (Claude Code bugs #15945, #13254, #4580).
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Updated CLAUDE.md Skill-to-Agent Mapping table to mark Lean skills as direct execution, added migration note to MCP Server Configuration section

next_steps: Test refactored skills by running /research and /implement on a Lean task
